title: Silver star
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| silver star \* [![Silver star.png](/images/b/b1/Silver_star.png)](/File:Silver_star.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                           | 150                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                               | 30                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                           | 5363                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                  | 10                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                       | 12                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                 | 15                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                           | Immune                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                  | [rF+](/Fire "Fire"), [rC+](/Cold "Cold"), [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity"), [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison"), [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy"), [rRot+++](/Rot "Rot"), [rSticky](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"), [rConstr](/Constriction "Constriction"), [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation"), [rHoly](/Resistance "Resistance") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                        | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                            | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                             | [Normal](/Category:Normal_intelligence "Category:Normal intelligence")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                         | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                         | [Holy](/Category:Holy_holiness "Category:Holy holiness")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

| Flags                                                                                    | [Glows](/Glows_flag "Glows flag") [Insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial") [Levitate](/Levitate "Levitate") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Silence immune](/Silence "Silence")                                                                                                                                         |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An orb of divine energy pulsating with blinding light.***“Ah star of evil! star of pain! Highhearted youth comes not again” -James Joyce, “Bahnhofstrasse”, \_Pomes Penyeach\_. 1927. |

*For a list of all holy monsters, see [list of holy monsters](/List_of_holy_monsters "List of holy monsters").*

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Silver stars** are powerful servants of [Zin](/Zin "Zin"), tasked with destroying any unclean forces that invade his domain. Although harmless to [good](/Good "Good")-aligned characters, their unique spell set grows more powerful based on how heavily [mutated](/Mutation "Mutation") or [evil](/Evil "Evil") you are. Curiously enough, their purifying spells are so strong that they can strip the [mutations](/Mutation "Mutation") from their targets, though this usually targets beneficial mutations. They can be found in [holy](/Holy "Holy")-themed [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") floors and [Zin](/Zin "Zin")-themed [vaults](/Vault "Vault") in [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium").

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                     |
| :-------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Holy Light](/Holy_Light "Holy Light") (3d40)       |
| Slot2     | [Holy Light](/Holy_Light "Holy Light") (3d40)       |
| Slot3     | *none*                                              |
| Slot4     | *none*                                              |
| Slot5     | [Silver Blast](/Silver_Blast "Silver Blast") (3d43) |
| Slot6     | [Silver Blast](/Silver_Blast "Silver Blast") (3d43) |

## Tips & Tricks

- Followers of good gods can fully resist almost all of their damage output (unless they're heavily mutated, in which case the Silver Blasts will do some damage). If you happen to have a few malmutations, a hostile silver star may be able to "cure" you of them if you let it blast you for a while.
- Followers of evil gods should treat them as slower, deadlier versions of the dreaded [orb of fire](/Orb_of_fire "Orb of fire"), and should combat them in much the same way (i.e. kill them and do it *fast*).
- They're particularly resistant to [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") and [poison](/Poison "Poison"), less so to [fire](/Fire "Fire") and [cold](/Cold "Cold").

## History

Silver stars were removed in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15").

Silver star

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
silver star * 
HP 150
HD 30
XP 5363
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 15
Will Immune



Resistances rF+, rC+,
rElec+++, rPois+++,
rN+++, rRot+++,
rSticky, rConstr,
rDrown, rHoly
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Normal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Holy
Size Little
Type silver star, silver star
Flags Glows
Insubstantial
Levitate
See invisible
Silence immune
An orb of divine energy pulsating with blinding light.

“Ah star of evil! star of pain!
Highhearted youth comes not again”
-James Joyce, “Bahnhofstrasse”, _Pomes Penyeach_. 1927.

For a list of all holy monsters, see list of holy monsters.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Silver stars are powerful servants of Zin, tasked with destroying any unclean forces that invade his domain. Although harmless to good-aligned characters, their unique spell set grows more powerful based on how heavily mutated or evil you are. Curiously enough, their purifying spells are so strong that they can strip the mutations from their targets, though this usually targets beneficial mutations. They can be found in holy-themed Ziggurat floors and Zin-themed vaults in Pandemonium.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Holy Light (3d40)
Slot2 Holy Light (3d40)
Slot3 none
Slot4 none
Slot5 Silver Blast (3d43)
Slot6 Silver Blast (3d43)

Tips & Tricks

  • Followers of good gods can fully resist almost all of their damage output (unless they're heavily mutated, in which case the Silver Blasts will do some damage). If you happen to have a few malmutations, a hostile silver star may be able to "cure" you of them if you let it blast you for a while.
  • Followers of evil gods should treat them as slower, deadlier versions of the dreaded orb of fire, and should combat them in much the same way (i.e. kill them and do it fast).
  • They're particularly resistant to electricity and poison, less so to fire and cold.

History

Silver stars were removed in 0.15.
